working together or having an effect together: In coactive teams, individuals achieve success in their individual events in order to achieve overall team success. a co-active approach to life coaching
More examplesFewer examplesThe system is made up of successive layers of co-active materials.The co-active approach is a method of teaching life skills to students who are deafblind.A coactive systems model of development provides a framework for examining ways in which person-environment relations may scaffold development.
